NAME: 1% Retinol Cream

EXFOLIATING & REJUVENATING

Delivers a high concentration of retinol to moisturize the skin.

Infused with green tea, vitamins C, D3 and E

1% Retinol Cream is best used at night and sunscreen is advised during the day, as the skin may become more sensitive to sunlight

Apply a pea-sized amount of cream to cleansed, dry skin. If skin is sensitive, limit use to twice a week and increase frequency gradually to every other night and finally to each night if tolerated. Keep away from the corners of the nose, mouth, and eyes. A tingling sensation when applied is expected.

NAME: Almond Honey Clay Mask, 4oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This formula gently exfoliates, purifies, and replenishes moisture, unveiling a luminous and rejuvenated complexion. *
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Indulge in our Almond Honey mask, designed to deeply hydrate while elevating your skincare ritual. This formula gently exfoliates, purifies, and replenishes moisture, unveiling a luminous and rejuvenated complexion. We suggest using this mask 1-4 times per week for the most optimal results. 

How to Use

Spread 1 Tbsp over entire face and neck avoiding the delicate areas around the eyes and mouth. Leave on for 10-20 minutes. Rinse well with warm water and wash cloth. Pat skin dry.

Benefits

- Stimulates the skin’s natural renewal cycle to improve firmness and elasticity.*
- Delivers major hydration for smoother, plumper skin to eliminate dry skin and soothe and smooth rough patches.*
- Soothes redness and irritation.*
- Dull, stressed, tired skin is revived from within to diminish visible fine lines and wrinkles.*
- Lightly exfoliates to smooth and brighten skin. *

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 Daily Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Smelling like purple vanilla, this lightly moisturizing silky hyaluronic gel cream is best applied to freshly misted skin, right after Balancing Skin Toner. Hyaluronic acid is naturally in your skin, keeping it plump, hydrated, and elastic.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 /Daily is a 1.1% medical grade hyaluronic acid gel cream that contains organic herbs, oils and a special spagyric oil of amethyst. These ingredients stimulate and provide nutrients for collagen induction. It is a great light moisturizer perfect for daily use on the face and anywhere on the body. It contains potent active ingredients for your skin with a high molecular weight hyaluronic gel cream base.

It can be paired with our Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 for facial acupuncture protocols (on our wholesale site for practitioners only). Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 is for use before and during microneedling or facial acupunture. Amethyst Micro 2 is also for use during microneedling, or to use after microneedling and in general daily use. Amethyst Micro 2 contains everything in Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1, plus some extra ingredients. Amethyst HH contains: Ji Xue Xao (Gotu Kola), Mu Zei (Horsetail), Wu Wei Zi (Shisandra), Butterfly Pea Flower, Vanilla bean, Spagyric oil of Amethyst and Hemp Seed Oil. Together these ingredients provide a wide array of collagen induction nutrients, aminos, silica, purple polyphenol antioxidants, omegas, fatty acids, vitamins and minerals for skin. It is anti inflammatory, soothing, reduces fine lines, resolves dark spots, speeds up healing, increases elasticity, hydrating, moisturizing and smells like vanilla. All ingredients are organic or tested beyond organic standards for pesticides, heavy metals and contamininants.  

  • For daily use and light moisturizing, use Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2. Apply it after washing, or after spritzing with our Balancing Skin Toner, before any heavy moisturizers or oil based products. Apply our Non Linear Serum after for deeper moisturizing. 
  • Hyaluronic acid gel deeply hydrates the skin and is naturally found in skin, keeping it healthy, youthful and also protecting the lipid barrier. It particularly suits skin with sensitivities, dryness, dull tone, fine lines, deep wrinkles, inflammations, redness, pimples or acne. 

WHAT IS SPAGYRIC OIL OF AMETHYST?

Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 has a light purple color that wont stain your skin. It contains herbs rich in purple polyphenols because purples are an excellent nutrient and we love the color of amethyst! Spagyric Oil of amethyst is an alchemical extract that yields a skin soothing oil. It is made with real wild harvested amethyst. Even though amethyst crystal does not contain oil, the minerals in the crystal are used to catalyse an oil using natural spagyric alchemical methods. It is a very special extract and a fascinating chemistry. The resulting oil of amethyst also contains the energetic imprint of the crystal amethyst. The spagyric oil of amethyst that we use is made by a colleague and spagyric mentor at Secret Fire Apothecary, with a cluster of Amethyst from Nova Scotia’s Amethyst Cove, in Canada. Another thing we love about this special spagyric crystal oil is that it does not require constant harvesting of crystals and the original crystal can be used to catalyse the oil for many years. 

Facial at home skincare steps. Our full facial acupuncture and micro needling sequence for licensed acupuncturists is on our wholesale site. 

  1. Apply one of our Medi-Pearl treatments, for dry or oily skin. More information on how to do the treatments with gua sha is on the Medi Pearl pages. Remove the treatment.
  2. Spritz and finish cleaning with our Balancing Skin Toner. 
  3. Apply Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 while the skin is still damp with skin toner. 
  4. Finish with our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer about 5 minutes after, or as soon as you notice your skin has absorbed most of the Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners. 

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This toner is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your product runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, oils, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 100ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $18. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!
SUB_CATEGORIES: Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Soap, Scrubs & Sanitation >>> Facial Toner || Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Topical Formulations
INGREDIENTS:
Distilled imploded water, **Hemp seed oil, **Gotu Kola (centella asiatica), *Wu wei zi (schisandrae fructus), **Horsetail (equisetum arvense), **Butterfly Pea Flower (clitoria ternatea), **Vanilla planifolia bean, Sodium Hyaluronate 1%, Spagyric oil of Amethyst & mineral salts, ^^Emulsifier (polygyceryl-2-stearate & glyceryl stearate & stearyl alcohol), ^^Preservative (propanediol & ethylhexylglycerin & potassium sorbate).

NAME: Argan Oil Revitalizing Serum
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Argan Oil Revitalizing Serum combines raw organic cosmetic-grade argan oil with Rose geranium and Frankincense essential oils. This versatile serum works well with all skin types and is designed for daily upkeep. Improvement may be seen from the very start of use.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Argan Oil Revitalizing Serum combines raw organic cosmetic-grade argan oil with Rose geranium and Frankincense essential oils. This versatile serum works well with all skin types and is designed for daily upkeep. Improvement may be seen from the very start of use.

Argan oil is an excellent skin nutritive and antioxidant that deeply restores, hydrates and nourishes the skin. Consistent use will prevent premature drying of the skin and wrinkle formation, ultimately slowing down the skin's aging process. This premier argan oil glides smoothly and absorbs quickly, leaving the skin velvety soft, supple and toned. It will brighten the skin and give it a fresh, refined appearance. Argan oil has a solid reputation for relaxing lines, softening wrinkles and reducing shadows under the eyes.

Our argan oil is expeller pressed in the artisan way by a Berber women's coop in the Moroccan Sahara desert. It is virgin cold-pressed in the traditional artisan manner and certified organic.

Geranium essential oil tones and refines the skin, and balances its pH. Part of its action is promoting skin cell detoxification and regeneration.

Frankincense essential oil refines and stimulates skin circulation. It also promotes deep regeneration of the skin cells.

Directions: For best results, after cleansing mist with a hydrosol to tone and moisturize, then apply the Argan Oil facial serum lightly using upward strokes. Use once or twice daily for continuous improvement.

For treating areas that may need special attention, our Cactus Seed Oil can be layered (e.g. around the eyes) once the Argan oil has absorbed – which is does very quickly. Argan Oil Facial Serum can also be combined with one of our other revitalizing facial serums (Dry, Combination, Mature, etc.) to make it more specific to your particular skin type.

NAME: Balancing Skin Toner, 100ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Smelling like caramelized roses, this spagyric fine mist spray goes on your skin right after you wash it. Prime your skin with this nutrient-dense mist.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Balancing Skin Toner is an alchemical spagyric, made with Mei Gui Hua, Jin Yin Hua, Bai Zhi, Witch Hazel & Spearmint. This toner is completely non toxic and at pH 5.5 for sensitive skin. Part of the spagyric process includes extracting the mineral salts from the herbs and recombining them into the formula, which makes a more gentle and bioavailable delivery system. You can feel how easily your skin drinks up the nutrients, while inflammations go away.  

Balancing Toner is part of our skincare routine. You can use it as follows:

  • Daily, after washing, before moisturizer. 
  • Spritz before applying our Amethyst Hyaluronic which loves to be applied to slightly wet skin.
  • To help remove our Medi-Pearl Skin Treatment, after steaming it off with a towel, before moisturizer. 
  • Daily to refresh after a big day.
  • Particularly suits skin with sensitivities, aging, inflammation, redness, pimples or acne. 
  • During cosmetic acupuncture appointments. Practitioners please see our Acupuncture sequences on our wholesale site. 

BALANCING TONER DIRECTIONS:

Apply to a cotton pad, then wipe over your face, taking care not to get any in your eyes.

 This toner can help to gently remove makeup, treatments and masks. Wait a few minutes for it to dry to experience the full pH balancing effects. 

Apply our Amethyst Hyaluronic and / or Non Linear Serum Moisturizer.

Alternatively, if you do not use or need moisturizer, you can just use the toner as it will leave your skin feeling hydrated and fresh. 

Facial at home skincare steps. Our full facial acupuncture and micro needling sequence for licensed acupuncturists is on our wholesale site. 

  1. Apply one of our Medi-Pearl treatments, for dry or oily skin. Full instructions on how to do the treatments with gua sha is on the Medi Pearl pages. Remove the treatment using our hot wet towels and our Balancing Skin Toner as directed.  
  2. Spritz with our Balancing Skin Toner. 
  3. Apply Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 while the skin is still damp with skin toner. 
  4. Finish with our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer about 5 minutes after, or as soon as you notice your skin has absorbed most of the Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners.

Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your product runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, oils, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 100ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $18. Apply our Amethyst Hyaluronic and / or Non Linear Serum Moisturizer.

Alternatively, if you do not use or need moisturizer, you can just use the toner as it will leave your skin feeling hydrated and fresh. 

Facial at home skincare steps. Our full facial acupuncture and micro needling sequence for licensed acupuncturists is on our wholesale site. 

  1. Apply one of our Medi-Pearl treatments, for dry or oily skin. Full instructions on how to do the treatments with gua sha is on the Medi Pearl pages. Remove the treatment using our hot wet towels and our Balancing Skin Toner as directed.  
  2. Spritz with our Balancing Skin Toner. 
  3. Apply Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 while the skin is still damp with skin toner. 
  4. Finish with our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer about 5 minutes after, or as soon as you notice your skin has absorbed most of the Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners.

Cruelty-Free Commitment: Embrace a grooming essential that aligns with your ethical values. Our Beard Oil stands as a testament to cruelty-free choices that seamlessly intertwine with exceptional grooming advantages, making it the conscientious and potent choice for your daily regimen.

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body system.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. NAME: Chinese Herbal Shampoo
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Moves the qi and quickens the blood in the scalp.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Moves the qi and quickens the blood in the scalp. Chinese doctors have been writing prescriptions for herbal hair care formulas for not less than 1,700 years. Typically, these formulas contain acrid-flavored medicinals which move the qi and quicken the blood. This is based on the idea that the qi moves the blood and the hair is the surplus of the blood. Therefore, if the blood in the scalp is healthy, so will be the hair. Within this formula, Dang Gui and Bai Zhi have been used for externally applied herbal hair care products in China for many centuries. When it comes to the beautification of the skin and hair, Bai Zhi is the most commonly used medicinal for external application found in Chen Guan-ting et al.s Zhong Yi Mei Rong Da Quan (Great Collection of Chinese Medicine Cosmetology), Chinese National Medicine & Medicinal Science & Technology Press, Beijing, 1989. Lu Hui is a more modern hair care ingredient. Pharmacological research has shown that Lu Hui contains emodin glycosides which are anti-inflammatory, bacteriostatic, and bacteriocidal. Other research has shown that Lu Hui has an exceptionally powerful ability to premeate the skin, thus giving this medicinal the ability to reach deep layers of the skin. Since Lu Hui also contains saccharides, amino acids, vitamins, and trace minerals, not only does it kill bacteria and resolve toxins, it also helps in tissue regeneration. Gan Ye Ju is also a more modern hair care ingredient. Used in South America as well as grown commercially in China, it is reported to retard the greying process, eliminate dandruff, and improve hair luster when applied externally. Contains no animal products or mineral oil. No animal testing. This formula contains no Sodium Laurel Sulfate (SLS). 8oz bottle Ingredients: An all plant-based shampoo containing water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Decyl Glucoside, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Methylchloroiso-thiazolinone, Methylosithiazolinone, Organic Aloe Vera juice, extracts of Bai Zhi, Dang Gui, Gan Ye Ju, Peppermint essential oil

How to Use

Body:
Scoop an ample amount of the sugar scrub into your hand and intentionally massage it onto your entire body. Whether your applying it to wet or dry skin, let the scrub work its magic. Rinse thoroughly with warm water, leaving your skin feeling revitalized. For the best results, incorporate this ritual into your daily self-care routine.

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body systems.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Collagen JS (120 capsules)
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Provides patented BioCell Collagen® collagen complex to support healthy joints and skin*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This product contains BioCell Collagen®, a patented, hydrolyzed and denatured low molecular weight collagen. In addition to collagen, BioCell Collagen® provides the combined benefits of hyaluronic acid (HA), depolymerized low molecular weight chondroitin sulfate, glucosamine sulfate, and amino acids including lysine, proline and hydroxyproline. These compounds promote cartilage synthesis and enhance synovial fluid, supporting the composition, integrity and motility of joints. A double-blind, placebo–controlled study involving 16 individuals supplementing with BioCell Collagen® for 8-weeks, indicated statistically significant support for joint function and comfort. In a peak absorption study, serum levels of HA increased gradually and with statistical significance after BioCell Collagen® supplementation, emphasizing the potential for this compound to provide important connective tissue support. The components of collagen also support the elasticity and firmness of skin. Furthermore, HA attracts water, promoting hydration and moisture retention within the dermal matrix. Case reports have suggested that BioCell Collagen® may help rejuvenate skin and modulate the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.*
 
  • Supports healthy joints and skin*
  • May help lessen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles*
  • Potential to provide connective tissue support*
  • Made with hypoallergenic ingredients

Collagen JS is a multi-molecule collagen complex that offers support for joint health as well as healthy skin. Collagen may support the elasticity and firmness of skin as well as help retain moisture.‡

DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Premier Hair, Skin and Nails Support*

  •     Features unique, patented solubilized keratin to make it highly bioavailable*
  •     Effectively supports skin moisture, elasticity and compactness*
  •     Clinically supports overall hair health and strength; also supports nails*
  •     Extracted keratin from pure New Zealand wool

DO YOU WANT BEAUTIFUL SKIN, HAIR AND NAILS?
Welcome to DermaVen™ and its revolutionary ingredient, solubilized keratin. Supplementing with bioavailable keratin can promote skin firmness, elasticity and protein structure.*

Keratin also helps promote skin brightness and radiance through its natural antoxidant properties; it also assists SOD and glutathione production. For hair health, keratin promotes hair strength and luster.* It also promotes nail strength and elasticity.* Wow – what a multi-beautyuse ingredient!

AT 500 mg PER DAY
This revolutionary patented process comprised of solubilized keratin provides the body with a more bioavailable keratin, which aids in clinically supporting and promoting radiant Skin, Hair and Nails.*

DermaVen™ features a unique, solubilized keratin made with the use of a revolutionary patented process. This product offers a more bioavailable keratin which aids in clinically supporting and promoting radiant skin, hair and nail health.*

Keratin Overview
Keratin is one of the fibrous structural proteins that supports epithelial cells during stress and is recognized as the key structural component critical to skin, hair and nail composition. Keratin delivers an exceptionally high content of the amino acid, cysteine, which is in itself an abundant source of sulfur molecules. Sulfur is the third most abundant mineral in the body and is an essential mineral that nourishes and promotes the health, strength and appearance of skin, hair and nails. Keratin by itself is not water soluble. To overcome this problem, a breakthrough patented process yields a solubilized keratin that possesses a unique colloidal dispersion that gives the keratin a greater bioavailability. Thus, supplementation with solubilized keratin, as found in DermaVen™, has clinically demonstrated its ability to support skin, hair and nail health.*

Supporting Skin Health
By supporting the protein structure of skin, keratin is able to promote skin firmness and elasticity.* Keratin is a protein that exists in many types of cells but is an essential component to the epithelial cells that make up the skin. Because keratin is a naturally rich source of sulfur, it provides a unique support for the skin’s collagen structure.* Supplementation with solubilized keratin has clinically demonstrated its ability to support skin health.*

Supporting Hair Health
Over 90% of the dry weight of hair is comprised of keratin, a protein that has a high disulfide content from its amino acid, cysteine. When sulfur molecules from cysteine bond together, they form very strong disulfide bridges which can promote the health of the hair shaft. Different parts of the hair shaft naturally have different levels of cysteine which means that for some people, the hair is straighter and for others, more curly. Even when hair is in stress, supplementation with solubilized keratin has clinically demonstrated its ability to support overall hair health.*

Supporting Nail Health
Nail strength is supported by the presence of keratin and the keratinization process. As keratin is formed in the body, it naturally pushes upward from the base of the nail. Specialized cells called keratinocytes promote the length, strength and overall health of the nails. Supplementation with solubilized keratin has clinically demonstrated its ability to support nail health.*
SUB_CATEGORIES: Nutritional Supplements >>> Cosmeceuticals || Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Internal Formulations

Serving Size 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container 30

  • Calcium (as carbonate from coral) 30 mg
  • Magnesium (as carbonate from coral) 15 mg
  • Keratin (solubilized) 500 mg
Other Ingredients: Organic Rice Protein, Plant-Source Capsules (cellulose, water)
DOSAGE: Take 2 capsules daily, or as directed by a health professional.

NAME: Diaper Skin Soother Plus
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Diaper rash, genital and groin eczema, female and male yeast infections, and other red, hot rashes of various sorts.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Red, hot, skin that is obviously painful. Diaper rash is a horrible thing to see. I remember when our daughter Emily had diaper rash. It was heart-wrenching to see her suffer with deep red splotches. (We unfortunately had not developed this product yet.)

Diaper rash is a form of dermatitis (skin inflammation). Most children suffer from it at one point or another. People often believe that it is from parent neglect and not changing diapers frequently enough. Studies show that this is rarely the cause.

There are many possible underlying causes. It can be from contact /allergic reactions to creams, wipes or diapers. It can be from rubbing or friction. It can come from food sensitivities. The irritated skin can also be infected by bacteria (Staph or Strep) or yeast (Candida). In the herbal view of things this type of hot, red, damp skin condition is usually considered 'damp heat'.

Our Emily Diaper Skin Soother Plus was formulated with all of the causes above in mind. There are just 6 simple ingredients and like all of our products, it was formulated for people who read labels and have sensitive skin. It is a gentle, unscented balm unlike any other diaper product that we know of. Here are the ingredients and their traditional indications 1:

Organic Sunflower Oil: Known as a ‘barrier’ oil and acts like the body’s own protective oils. It is full of vitamin E which is good for the skin.

Beeswax: serves as a lubricant and a barrier and has been used for its antiseptic and healing properties for thousands of years.

Frankincense: Traditionally used in the treatment of injury and skin conditions to reduce swelling, alleviate pain and promote healing.

Red Peony Root: Traditionally used to ‘clear heat; and cool. Also used for swelling, pain and injury. Antibacterial: demonstrates an inhibitory effect on certain bacteria.

Dictamnus Root Bark: A bitter and cold herb used traditionally for extreme heat signs, ‘damp-heat’. Used for sores, rashes, eczema and demonstrates an antifungal effect.

Phellodendron Bark: Another bitter cold herb traditionally used for ‘damp-heat’ presentations in the genital /anal area. Drains heat from sores and lesions. Demonstrates antimicrobial and antifungal effect.

Sources: (1) Bensky, D., & Gamble, A. (1993). Chinese Herbal Medicine: Materia Medica. Seattle, WA: Eastland Press, Inc and (2) Chen, John K. and Chen, Tina T. (2008) Chinese Herbal Formulas and Applications. New York: Art of Medicine Press.

While we can’t and don’t make any medical claims, we hope you will find the product soothes skin affected by many different types of red, hot, angry skin conditions. It is not only for diaper conditions. We have also received positive feedback from people using it for other conditions like: Genital and groin eczema, Female and male yeast infections, and other red, hot rashes of various sorts.

Here is feedback from a few of the mom’s in our product testing group:

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body system.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Hair-Vit, 30 capsules
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Hair-Vit capsules are specially formulated to provide vital nutrients required for healthy looking hair*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Why Choose Hair-Vit®?

  • Hair-Vit® is in easy to swallow soft gel capsules
  • Hair-Vit® is rich in amino acids
  • Hair-Vit's® hydrolyzed gelatin is a powerful source of 18 different amino acids which aid in the formation of proteins that provide support to the root, and are essential to hair growth and hair follicle formation*.
  • Hair-Vit® contains yeast, which is rich in amino acids, B-complex vitamins and trace minerals like zinc, copper, and selenium that are important to help maintain healthy hair*.
  • Hair-Vit® is a balanced supplement containing all the essential nutrients
  • Hair-Vit® comes in a convenient ONE-A-DAY dose
  • Hair-Vit® is suitable for men and women

What is Hair-Vit® for?

  • Hair loss is a major concern amongst men and women. The primary factors of hair loss are either hereditary; hormonal imbalances; extreme levels of stress; age; and the lack of a healthy balanced diet.
  • Hair-vit® is a supplement that provides a full range of the essential B vitamins that help with the overall condition of the hair; minerals such as Zinc that helps hair growth by stimulating the immune system and amino acids which aid in the formation of proteins that provide support to the root*. Biotin and other nutrients that are essential to hair growth and hair follicle formation are also present in this original formulation*.
  • Hair-vit ® offers optimum care for healthy looking hair and helps ensure that the essential nutrients reach the hair follicles in the scalp via the blood stream; offering ultimate nourishment from within*.

NAME: Herbal Hair & Scalp Treatment
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: The combination of traditional Western and Ayurvedic herbs in this blend is designed to promote hair growth, protect and strengthen the hair and alleviate dandruff.*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
The combination of traditional Western and Ayurvedic herbs in this blend is designed to promote hair growth, protect and strengthen the hair and alleviate dandruff. These herbs have been used for centuries and are believed to have beneficial effects on the scalp and hair.  Nettle, sesame oil, and horsetail are believed to provide essential nutrients and improve blood circulation to the scalp, which can help nourish hair follicles and encourage healthy hair growth.  Gotu Kola provides the proper proteins for mending weak and breaking hair strands, as well as increasing a healthy shine. Coltsfoot naturally conditions your hair, providing deep moisture and protection.*

How to Use

Shake well. Thoroughly massage 1-3 tbsp into unwashed, dry hair and scalp. Comb evenly through hair. Massage scalp slightly. Leave treatment in for 20 minutes to 1 hour. Shampoo & condition hair as usual. Individual use may vary: you may have to shampoo twice before conditioning. Recommended use: Up to 4 times per week.

Benefits

- Promotes hair growth
- Alleviates dandruff*
- Strengthens hair follicles
- Conditions
- Deeply hydrates
- Mends damaged hair strands*
- Vegan

NAME: Herbal Hyaluronic Gel Micro 1 Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Herbal Hyaluronic Gel Micro 1 is a 1.1% high molecular weight hyaluronic acid gel infused with herbs that stimulate and provide nutrients for collagen induction. It is paired with our Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic for facial acupuncture protocols.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Herbal Hyaluronic Gel Micro 1 is a 1.1% high molecular weight hyaluronic acid gel infused with herbs that stimulate and provide nutrients for collagen induction. It is paired with our Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic for facial acupuncture protocols. Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 is for use before and during microneedling or facial acupunture. It is soothing and filled with herbal actives that produce collagen and nourish the skin, including: Ji Xue Xao (Gotu Kola), Mu Zei (Horsetail) and Vanilla bean. Together these ingredients provide a wide array of potent collagen induction nutrients, aminos, silica, vitamins and minerals for skin. It is anti inflammatory, soothing, reduces fine lines, speeds up healing, increases elasticity, hydrating and smells like vanilla. All ingredients are organic or tested beyond organic standards for pesticides, heavy metals and contaminants. 

DIRECTIONS:

  • Apply Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 on slightly wet, clean skin before, during and after microneedling or facial acupuncture.
  • Practitioners: see the facial acupuncture information on our wholesale site. 
  • Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 is best used before, during and after micro needling, derma rolling or facial acupuncture.
  • For daily use and light moisturizing, use Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2. Apply it after washing, before any heavy moisturizers or oil based products.
  • Hyaluronic acid gel deeply hydrates the skin and is naturally found in skin, keeping it healthy, youthful and also protecting the lipid barrier. It particularly suits skin with sensitivities, dryness, dull tone, fine lines, deep wrinkles, inflammations, redness, pimples or acne. 

Facial at home skincare steps. Our full facial acupuncture and micro needling sequence for licensed acupuncturists is on our wholesale site.

  1. Apply one of our Medi-Pearl treatments, for dry or oily skin. More information on how to do the treatments with gua sha is on the Medi Pearl pages. Remove the treatment.
  2. Spritz and finish cleaning with our Balancing Skin Toner. 
  3. Apply Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 while the skin is still damp with skin toner. 
  4. Finish with our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer about 5 minutes after, or as soon as you notice your skin has absorbed most of the Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners. 

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This toner is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your product runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, oils, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 100ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $18. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Antioxidant rich, powerful, rejuvenates
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
The skin under your eyes is the thinnest and most delicate skin on the body, therefore, it needs a product that is thicker, richer and specially formulated to take care of its very specific needs. Our Body Nurish eye cream is loaded with plant-infused oils and potent antioxidants made to target every under eye issue on your list. Be sure to apply this one along the brow bone as well!

How to Use

Warm the balm with your fingers then dab a small amount around the eye area and brows.

Benefits

- Brightens*
- Firms and supports elasticity*
- Improves fine lines and wrinkles*
- Improves dry skin *

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Formulated with Jade Powder, Ginseng and only the finest active herbal ingredients this detoxifying and anti-aging facial exfoliator gently sweeps away dead skin cells and impurities that can dull the surface of the skin while protecting against environmental toxins.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Formulated with Jade Powder, Ginseng and only the finest active herbal ingredients this detoxifying and anti-aging facial exfoliator gently sweeps away dead skin cells and impurities that can dull the surface of the skin while protecting against environmental toxins. This unique exfoliator softly polishes skin with non-abrasive Rose Hips leaving your skin silky smooth without irritation.  Rose Hips promote skin regeneration and are known to soothe and heal sun burns and skin burns. Their healing properties repair dry and sun damaged skin, and they can be used to reduce or eliminate the appearance of scars. Rose Hips have also been known to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, age spots, and to shrink large pores. Their powerful anti-aging properties promote the skin’s natural regeneration cycle helping it produce more collagen and elastin.  Your skin will look and feel healthy, radiant and youthful.

Use 2-4 Times a Week or As Needed [AM/PM]: Apply small amount to damp face and neck in light upward and outward circles. Avoid eye area. Rinse well

UGL complex is an anti-aging complex, bioengineered from Glucosamine HCl (Glucosamine hydrochloride  An amino sugar and one of the most abundant monosaccharides, often used to treat psoriasis and help with skin rejuvenation, it assists in maintaining the elasticity and integrity of the connective tissue).  It is designed to exfoliate in the pH conditions of the skin at a 4.0 level while, at the same time, calming the skin.  Beneficial for all skin types. <EOL> <EOL>According to studies utilizing the UGL complex: <EOL> <EOL>In 2 weeks  smoothness improved by 33% <EOL>In 4 weeks  smoothness improved by 45%, wrinkles diminished by 33%, hydration increased by 44% and firmness improved by 25 <EOL>In 12 weeks  dramatically increased integral firmness (+55%). Light tingling and redness may occur. Always test product on small area before use on entire face. <EOL> <EOL>For a more powerful treatment apply multiple layers.  Allow one layer to dry for about 3-5 minutes before applying another layer. Each coat penetrates the skin to a deeper level.

NAME: Juniper & Vetiver Balm, 2oz tin
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Infused with the healing embrace of desert jojoba, aloe vera, and shea butter, our formula offers solace to weather-beaten skin and wages war against the unyielding dryness that accompanies your rugged outdoor exploits.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Answer the primal call of the wild and embrace boundless adventures with our invigorating blend of Vetiver and rugged Juniper notes, a versatile scent that becomes your fearless companion on every untamed trail. Infused with the healing embrace of desert jojoba, aloe vera, and shea butter, our formula offers solace to weather-beaten skin and wages war against the unyielding dryness that accompanies your rugged outdoor exploits. The harmonious partnership of Juniper and Sandalwood work in untamed synergy to infuse your skin with untold vitality, ensuring a revitalized and robust complexion that speaks of the wild at heart. Whether applied after an expedition on chapped feet or as armor before conquering new frontiers, experience the commanding touch of this balm, and you might just find that there's no retreat from its transformative effects.

How to Use

To apply the balm, using your finger scoop up a small amount, and gently massage it into the skin using circular motions. Use as frequently as required, day or night. Keep in mind, a small amount is all you need to achieve great results, so use sparingly!

Benefits

Deep Hydration: Our all-purpose balm provides intense hydration, quenching dry skin and leaving it feeling soft and nourished.

Free From Harsh Chemicals: Rest assured, our balm is formulated without harsh chemicals, parabens, and sulfates, offering a clean and gentle solution for your skincare needs.

Soothing Relief: Experience instant relief from discomfort with the balm's soothing properties, ideal for irritated skin, chapped lips, and minor skin irritations.

Versatile Moisturization: From lips to elbows, knees to cuticles, this balm delivers versatile moisturization, catering to all areas for your body's needs.

Locks in Moisture: Formulated to create a protective barrier, the balm locks in moisture, shielding your skin from environmental factors that contribute to dryness.

Enhances Skin Texture: Regular use of the balm helps improve skin texture, promoting a smoother and more supple feel.

Calms Redness: Whether it's a sunburn, windburn, minor rashes, or post-shave irritation, the balm's calming ingredients work to reduce redness and inflammation.

Long-Lasting Comfort: Enjoy extended comfort with the balm's long-lasting effects, ensuring your skin stays moisturized throughout the day.

Promotes Healing: With its healing properties, the balm aids in the recovery of small cuts, scrapes, and cracked skin, fostering a rejuvenated appearance.

Travel Essential: Compact and convenient, the balm is a must-have travel companion, ready to tackle various skincare needs on the go.

Ideal for All Skin Types: Whether you have sensitive, dry, or normal skin, our balm is suitable for all skin types, making it a versatile addition to your skincare routine.

Multi-Seasonal Use: From the harsh cold of winter to the drying heat of summer, this balm adapts to different seasons, ensuring your skin stays comfortable year-round.

Eco-Friendly Choice: Choose a sustainable option with our eco-friendly packaging and ingredients, making a positive impact on both your skin and the environment.

Loved by All Ages: Whether you're caring for your own skin or your family's, this balm is suitable for all ages, becoming a staple in your household.

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body system.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Liquid Soap Soother
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: unlike any liquid soap you have ever seen
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our liquid soap…. Wait until you see and try our Organic Liquid Soap Soother. It is unlike any liquid soap you have ever seen. Like all of the Emily products, it is made for people with sensitive skin and for people who are careful about what they put on their skin. It is organic certified, has no color, no fragrance, and is made with gentle, all-natural ingredients.

Then it is “super-fatted”. ‘What does that mean?’ you ask. Read on and we’ll explain...

We start with the gentlest organic soap/gel base made of rich, moistening and organic ingredients that will not strip your protective oils or make your skin drier:

  • • Saponified Organic Coconut Oil
  • • Saponified Organic Olive Oil
  • • Saponified Organic Jojoba Oil
  • • Organic Guar Gum Extract
  • • Organic Aloe Vera
  • • Rosemary Extract

There is absolutely nothing else in our soap base. NO parabens. NO Sodium Laurel or Laureth Sulfate (SLS). NO added color. NO added fragrances.

Then we take more Organic Olive Oil and cook in the following 4 herbs:

  • • Rehmannia Root
  • • Angelica Sinensis Root
  • • Dandelion Herb
  • • Field Mint

This herb-infused oil is then added back to our soap base. In traditional soap making, adding extra oils back into soap is called “super-fatting”. It makes for an extra moistening, silky and emollient soap.  

We do not know of any other ‘super-fatted’ liquid soap available. It simply is more expensive to make and most manufacturers are afraid that customers will be scared off by a product that settles. 

We are just the opposite. We’ve put it in a clear bottle so you can see that ‘super-fatted’ difference. If you let it sit for a while, those extra oils will settle. As it says on the label, “This is a natural product. If it settles, shake it! Shake it! Shake it!”  

We are confident that you have never seen or felt a liquid soap this gentle and soothing.

Our Liquid Soap Soother lathers wonderfully but does not strip or dry your skin. Use it from head to toe, for all your soap needs.

For people with dry skin conditions, soaps can be a huge factor. Most commercial soaps are TROUBLE. They smell and lather well, but they are full of harsh chemicals and fragrances which open your pores up and strip away your natural, protective oils, leaving you drier. Even soaps that are supposedly for ‘sensitive skin’ or for ‘infants’ are often full of harsh chemicals, just in smaller amounts. Emily and I both have sensitive skin and liquid soaps were almost impossible for us. That is why we had to make a healthy alternative.

If you have dry or sensitive skin you should use a natural soap with as few ingredients as possible. The more ingredients, the more your skin has to deal with and potentially react to. Read your labels to see how many unpronounceable ingredients are in most soap. Then, try our soap. We think you’ll find it leaves your skin clean, soft, and happy. Your skin will thank you.

NAME: Marine Collagen, 7oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Type I collagen provides rigidity, elasticity and strength to skin, tendons, ligaments, bones, teeth, and cartilage.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Supports Skin, Joint, and Gut Health

  •     An easy to absorb, highly digestible protein enrichment supplement*
  •     Provides 19 out of 20 amino acids which help maintain lean muscle mass and support workout recovery*
  •     Maintains healthy skin, and connective tissues, including bones, tendons, and ligaments*
  •     Improves the structure and flexibility of the skin’s dermis by increasing collagen synthesis and collagen density*
  •     Reduces the appearance of wrinkles by enhancing hydration and elasticity of the skin*
  •     Supports healthy joint function which may preserve mobility, and comfort of aging joints.*
  •     Mediates and maintains collagen formation in bones.*
  •     Supports the integrity of the Intestinal Epithelial Barrier Function (IEBF) by modulating tight junction proteins reducing gut permeability*
  •     Sourced from wild-caught, deep-sea fish

Type I Collagen – Essential to Tissue Repair

Accounting for 30% of the body’s total body protein, collagen is the most abundant and ubiquitous protein that works to maintain the structure and function of the skin and connective tissues throughout the body. Healthy skin is the body’s primary barrier to prevent dehydration and potential infection while maintaining moisture and body temperature. Skin elasticity and firmness are dependent on collagen peptides. Visible signs of collagen loss are evident in early adulthood, with the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, as well as slight joint discomfort.

Compared to commercial collagen peptide supplements made from bovine or porcine sources, marine collagen has a low molecular weight and delivers the most predominant type of collagen in the body, type I collagen. Type I collagen provides rigidity, elasticity and strength to skin, tendons, ligaments, bones, teeth, and cartilage.

Quantum Versatility

Premier Marine Collagen™ utilizes the glycoproteins necessary to help modulate collagen production, strengthen the skin barrier, reduce the appearance of wrinkles, and hydrate dry skin.* Supplementing with hydrolyzed marine collagen, coupled with dietary sources of antioxidants (vitamin C) and micronutrients (zinc, copper) delivers bioactive, short-chain nutritional collagen peptides, which support collagen synthesis, in the tissues that need it the most.

Hydrolyzed with food grade enzymes, PRL’s Premier Marine Collagen™ is versatile for everyday use. Tasteless, fully dissolvable, and bioavailable, PRL’s Premier Marine Collagen is ready to be mixed into your favorite morning beverages, juice blends, miso soups, broths and more!

Aside from slowing the inevitable effects of skin ageing, hydrolyzed collagen supplementation is associated with additional beneficial effects.
 
Mobility Maintenance with Marine Collagen

Collagen production and turnover can become impaired due to a variety of factors. Evidence suggests that hydrolyzed collagen peptides can support healthy joint function which may preserve mobility, comfort aging joints, and help to maintain lean muscle mass.*

Physical stimulation, including weight-bearing exercise, activates fibroblasts, increasing collagen production. In a systematic review of clinical trial outcomes for the use of collagen for joint discomfort due to injuries, muscle soreness, and exercise recovery, doses of 5-10g collagen peptides daily for over 3-6 months produced moderate benefits in the “pain during activity” parameter.
 
Stop the Gap in Protein Synthesis

Collagen hydrolysate (CH) has become a preferred form for supplementing with protein-packed collagen peptides. Hydrolyzed collagen peptides are inherently anabolic and provide essential and nonessential amino acids that support healthy bones and connective tissue. Premier Marine Collagen™ delivers an easy to absorb, highly digestible protein enrichment supplement* with minimal calorie content.

Protein requirements vary depending on life stage, genetic predisposition, health condition, and exercise intensity. Premier Marine Collagen™ provides 19 out of 20 amino acids which help maintain lean muscle mass, support workout recovery* while increasing total daily protein intake and improving dietary amino acid balance. Supplementing with Premier Marine Collagen™ could be especially useful for those individuals who have inadequate daily protein intake (due to life stage, exercise intensity, or health condition) or have difficulty digesting animal or legume-derived dietary proteins. It is also paleo and keto friendly.

Hydrolyzed marine collage peptides have a low molecular weight as well as abundant amounts of proline and other necessary amino acids to support the integrity of the intestinal epithelial barrier function (IEBF) by modulating tight junction proteins, reducing gut permeability. Proline, a predominant amino acid in collagen peptides, has been reported to upregulate tight junction proteins in intestinal epithelial cells. Premier Marine Collagen™ may support gut health by providing necessary nutrients to reduce gut permeability.*

Quality Tested & Sustainably Sourced Premier Marine Collagen™ is sustainably sourced from Canada utilizing the skin of wild-caught, deep-sea ocean fish including cod, haddock, and pollock. Thoroughly tested for contaminants including the presence of heavy metals, industrial solvents, and microbial pathogens, our hydrolyzed marine collagen meets high quality standards of The United States Pharmacopoeia (USP), European Pharmacopoeia (EP) and Japanese Pharmacopoeia (JP). Premier Marine Collagen™ offers a pure, unadulterated, heavy-metal tested, antibiotic- and hormone-free alternative to bovine, porcine, and poultry-based collagen products.

PRL’s sustainably sourced, quality tested commitment ensures that Premier Marine Collagen exceeds industry standards, batch to batch, offering the best of what collagen has to offer.

NAME: Medi-Pearl Treatment for Dry Skin Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi Treatment for DRY SKIN with Pimples and Blackheads
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi Treatment for DRY SKIN with Pimples and Blackheads

The Dry Skin Treatment is not just for those with pimples and blackheads, but for people with dry skin or who want an anti-aging treatment. Getting the mix right for dry skin with oily blockages is tricky, as often dryness can be the cause of oil imbalances.

Our unique blend of 8 Chinese herbs and preparation methods provide the ultimate treatment to promote skin healing as well as re-texturization of comedones so they come out easily and new blemishes cease to form. Featuring Astragalosides which can lengthen telomeres, potentiated with other skin nourishing herbs like Ji Xue Cao and Dang Gui this treatment is also anti-aging. Over about 6 weeks, this is an approximate guide of what you can expect for your skin:

Week 1-2: Blackheads start to easily come out as they re-texturize, pimples heal fast. Dry flakes and blemishes seem to heal more rapidly and new softer skin begins to come through underneath. Dry rough skin is becoming soft and plump.

Weeks 3-4: Depending on how many blemishes or blackheads you had to begin with, the prior stage may continue, but you’ll find that less new blemishes form. The pores are staying cleaner. Dryness is becoming moisturized from deeper within the skin and lines and wrinkles appear reduced.

Weeks 5-6: Dryness, blemishes, tendency for pore blockages, fine lines and wrinkles have all reduced.

If your skin continues to form new pimples the cause is most likely an imbalance in your endocrine (hormonal) system or you are having reactions to foods, allergens or toxins in your environment. Please see a qualified practitioner for a customized care plan that is tailored to your unique health needs.

DIRECTIONS: Suitable for use in Acupuncture treatments. See our facial  acupuncture sequences with Bio HerboloQi products on our wholesale site for practitioners. 

EXTERNAL USE ONLY – SHAKE VERY WELL BEFORE USE – Contents settle. We prefer not to use harsh chemicals and the natural contents will settle. You do need to shake or stir well EACH TIME you use this product.

Use 2-3 times per week for 6 weeks. Continue use as needed. You may find you can use it less often for maintenance after the first 6 week course.

APPLY – Gua Sha or massage about 1 teaspoon of treatment into the skin and pores lightly for approximately 5-10 minutes. Then let the treatment soak into your skin for approximately 30 minutes. (Do not gua sha over cystic acne).

STEAM – Drape a warm wet washcloth over your face (or area of application) to steam for 1 minute before wiping the treatment off. You will need to repeat this step 3-4 times. You can extend the steam time to about 10 minutes, which will assist more stubborn blackheads to loosen for removal.

REMOVE – Using the warm wet washcloth wipe the treatment off a 3-4 times. Apply fresh warm water to the cloth each time you steam, then wipe. Don’t use soaps to remove all of the treatment or you will lose a lot of the moisturization benefits that occur in the hours after removing this treatment.

TONE – You can use our Balancing Skin Toner to complete removal of the treatment and encourage pores to close.

MOISTURIZE – For best results apply our Amethyst Hyaluronic first, then our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer after removing your treatment or showering. Do not skip this step or it can work against our treatment’s process. While the treatment is moisturizing, it is not a moisturizer. When you apply moisturizer you continue the process for the active ingredients on your face to be carried further into your skin cells. You will find the final step leaves your skin smoother and more hydrated from within. 

Note: The first two applications of a Medi Pearl treatment may be more drying than the following applications as your skins oil balance restores.

If you have combination skin YES you can combine use of the DRY and OILY skin treatments. You can use each one on different skin areas, or blend them if you think you need a bit of each. For example, if you have an oily T Zone and dry cheeks, we recommend using the Dry treatment on the cheeks and the Oily treatment on the T Zone.  If you have combination skin with no blemishes and want the anti-aging benefits we recommend using the DRY treatment.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners.

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This treatment is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your treatment runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of this 200ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $20. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!
SUB_CATEGORIES: Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Soap, Scrubs & Sanitation >>> Facial Cleanser || Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Soap, Scrubs & Sanitation >>> Facial Toner
INGREDIENTS:

Do not skip this step or it can work against our treatment’s process. While the treatment is moisturizing, it is not a moisturizer. When you apply moisturizer you continue the process for the active ingredients on your face to be carried further into your skin cells. You will find the final step leaves your skin smoother and more hydrated from within. 

Note: The first two applications of a Medi Pearl treatment may be more drying than the following applications as your skins oil balance restores.

If you have combination skin YES you can combine use of the DRY and OILY skin treatments. You can use each one on different skin areas, or blend them if you think you need a bit of each. NAME: Medi-Pearl Treatment for Oily Skin Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi Treatment for OILY SKIN with Acne or Cystic Acne.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi Treatment for OILY SKIN with Acne or Cystic Acne.

The Oily Skin Treatment is for those with acne and or deeper cystic acne.

Our unique blend of 11 Chinese herbs and preparation methods provide the ultimate treatment to promote skin healing as well as re-texturization of comedones so they come out easily and new blemishes cease to form. Over about 6 weeks, this is an approximate guide of what you can expect for your skin:

Week 1-3: Acne blemishes begin to reduce in redness, and size. Blackheads start to easily come out as they re-texturize. Blemishes seem to heal more rapidly and new clearer skin begins to come through underneath. Oily skin starts to balance out more and take longer to become oily.

Weeks 4-7: Depending on how severe or cystic the acne was to begin with, the prior stage will continue, but you’ll find that less new blemishes form. The pores are staying cleaner. The blemishes are less red and inflamed.

Weeks 7-10: Redness and acne blemishes have reduced. Skin is not as oily, some scars have reduced.

If your skin continues to form new pimples the cause is most likely an imbalance in your endocrine (hormonal) system or you are having reactions to foods, allergens or toxins in your environment. Please see a qualified practitioner for a customized care plan that is tailored to your unique health needs.

DIRECTIONS: Suitable for use during facial acupuncture treatments. Practitioners see our acupuncture sequence on our wholesale site. 

EXTERNAL USE ONLY – SHAKE VERY WELL BEFORE USE – Contents settle. We prefer not to use harsh chemicals and the natural contents will settle. You do need to shake or stir well EACH TIME you use this product.

Use 3-4 times per week for 6 weeks. Continue use as needed. You may find you can use it less often for maintenance after the first 6 week course.

APPLY – Gua Sha, use facial cups or massage about 1 teaspoon of treatment into the skin and pores lightly for approximately 5-10 minutes. Then let the treatment soak into your skin for approximately 30 minutes. (Do not gua sha over cystic acne, but do facial cupping instead).

STEAM – Drape a warm wet washcloth over your face (or area of application) to steam for 1 minute before wiping the treatment off. You will need to repeat this step 3-4 times. You can extend the steam time to about 10 minutes, which will assist more stubborn blackheads to loosen for removal.

REMOVE – Using the warm wet washcloth wipe the treatment off a 3-4 times. Apply fresh warm water to the cloth each time you steam, then wipe. Don’t use soaps to remove all of the treatment or you will lose a lot of the oil balancing and moisturization benefits that occur in the hours after removing this treatment.

TONE – You can use our Balancing Skin Toner to complete removal of the treatment and encourage pores to close.

MOISTURIZE – For best results apply our Amethyst Hyaluronic then Non Linear Serum Moisturizer after removing your treatment or showering. Do not skip this step or it can work against our treatment’s process. While the treatment is moisturizing, it is not a moisturizer. When you apply moisturizer you continue the process for the active ingredients on your face to be carried further into your skin cells. You will find the final step leaves your skin smoother and more hydrated from within.

Note: The first two applications may be more drying than the following applications as your skins oil balance restores.

If you have combination skin YES you can combine use of the DRY and OILY skin treatments. You can use each one on different skin areas, or blend them if you think you need a bit of each. For example, if you have an oily T Zone and dry cheeks, we recommend using the Dry treatment on the cheeks and the Oily treatment on the T Zone.  If you have combination skin with no blemishes and want the anti-aging benefits we recommend using the DRY treatment.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners.

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This treatment is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

NAME: Neem Plus, 90 Caps
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Ayurvedic Skin Support
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Ayurvedic Skin Support

AYUSH™ NEEM PLUS™ has Azadirachta indica (neem) for its immune-supporting and skin healing properties. It also has a proprietary blend of Emblica officinalis (amla) for its antioxidant and adaptogenic properties; Terminalia chebula (haritaki) as a detoxifier; Terminalia belerica for its digestive and liver support, as well as Tinospora cordifolia and Rubia cordifolia for their immune-supporting effects. Neem Plus™ helps to support a healthy digestive system and microbiome while also promoting skin health.

The Latin name, Azadirachta indica, for neem is derived from the Arabic language Azadirach-E-Hind, which translates to free growing tree of India. All parts of this evergreen branched tree are highly regarded in Ayurvedic medicine. The young fruits, stem and root bark are astringent, while the fresh twigs are often used to clean teeth. The seed is a stimulant, while the oils and seeds offer antiseptic and insect repellant properties. Neem has been recognized for its use in offering a healthy response to fungus, infection and immune support, is a digestive stimulant for healthy digestion, liver supporting and healthy detoxification, and blood sugar support.

  • Promotes blood purification and detoxification
  • Promotes and supports healthy, radiant skin
  • Helps maintain blood glucose levels already within a normal range*

Guna (Properties): Light
Rasa (Taste): Astringent, bitter
Vipak (Post-Digestive Taste): Pungent
Virya (Energies): Cold
Prabhav (Effects): Kusht roghar and rakat shodhak (promotes healthy skin and wound healing and helps maintains normal blood sugar balance)
SUB_CATEGORIES: Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Internal Formulations
DOSAGE: 1 capsule daily or as directed by your physician.

NAME: Non Linear Serum Moisturizer Sample, 2ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This serum moisturizer contains a proprietary blend of 8 immortal Chinese herbs in multiple extracts and forms, infused into a non-comedogenic moisturizing serum oil base. Featuring 3 different Huang Qi / astragalus extracts, it has potent skin healing and anti-aging medicine.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This serum moisturizer contains a proprietary blend of 8 immortal Chinese herbs in multiple extracts and forms, infused into a non-comedogenic moisturizing serum oil base. Featuring 3 different Huang Qi / astragalus extracts, it has potent skin healing and anti-aging medicine. Astragaloside IV (four) is known to stimulate telomerase, which acts on the DNA to lengthen telomeres. As our telomeres shorten, we age and the signs of aging such as wrinkles, loss of collagen and degradation occur. Nestled in a powerful combination of 8 immortal Chinese herbs, Non Linear is a nutrient rich skin food. All of the ingredients are certified organic or above these standards when it comes to pesticide residues, heavy metals and other toxins or impurities. This serum is so clean it’s also edible.

NAME: Organic Rose Phyto Facial Cleanser - 5 oz.
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This cleanser is jam-packed with tons of skin loving ingredients to remove all traces of dirt and grime, without ever stripping your skin.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
You’ve just cleansed your face, but why does it feel so dry? We’d hate to be the bearer of bad news, but behind the lather of most conventional face cleansers lies a dirty secret. Harsh and synthetic ingredients may leave your skin feeling squeaky clean, but they also strip your skin of beneficial oils, which then completely throw off your skin’s delicate pH balance.

Ditch the fake stuff, and instead invest in our all natural Rose Phyto3 Gentle Face Cleanser. This cleanser is jam-packed with tons of skin loving ingredients to remove all traces of dirt and grime, without ever stripping your skin. You’ll enjoy a foamy and creamy lather as a result of natural ingredients, we never use sulfates, along with our anti-aging blend of rose and acaí stem cells, peptides, and fruit and herbal extracts.

How to Use

Our cleanser will help promote overall clearer, healthier, and happier skin!  Massage a small amount onto a damp face, rinsing with warm water. Use morning and evening. Follow with Rose Phyto³ Toner and Facial Cream.

Benefits

Deep Cleansing: The foaming cleanser effectively removes dirt, impurities, and excess oil from the skin, providing a thorough and deep cleanse. It helps unclog pores and leaves your skin feeling clean, refreshed, and revitalized.

Antioxidant Powerhouse: The combination of rose and acai stem cells, kakadu plum, peptides, and vitamin C ester provides a potent blend of antioxidants. These antioxidants help neutralize free radicals, protecting the skin from environmental stressors and reducing the signs of aging.

Brightening and Evens Skin Tone: Kakadu plum, known for its high vitamin C content, helps brighten the skin and even out skin tone. Vitamin C ester further enhances this effect, promoting a more radiant and luminous complexion.

Nourishing and Rejuvenating: Rose and acai stem cells possess nourishing and rejuvenating properties that help promote skin regeneration and renewal. They can contribute to a healthier, more youthful-looking complexion.

Supports Collagen Production: Peptides, a key ingredient in the cleanser, support collagen production in the skin. Collagen is essential for maintaining skin elasticity and firmness, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Hydrating and Moisturizing: The foaming cleanser contains hydrating ingredients that help replenish moisture in the skin, preventing dryness and maintaining a hydrated and supple complexion.

Gentle and Non-Irritating: Despite its powerful ingredients, the foaming cleanser is gentle and non-irritating. It is suitable for most skin types, including sensitive skin, and can be used daily without causing dryness or irritation.

Preps the Skin for Skincare Routine: By effectively removing impurities, the foaming cleanser prepares the skin for the application of serums, moisturizers, and other skincare products. It ensures better absorption and efficacy of subsequent products in your skincare routine.

Refreshing and Uplifting: The foaming cleanser provides a refreshing and uplifting experience, leaving your skin feeling clean, balanced, and invigorated. Its pleasant scent and luxurious texture contribute to an enjoyable cleansing ritual.

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Refreshes and Revitalizes: Provides an instant burst of freshness, awakening and invigorating your skin.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Transform your skin with our Organic Rose Phyto3 Facial Mist. Infused with the power of Rose distillate, Peptides, Pomegranate, Kakadu plum, Acai and Hibiscus extracts, plus Rose & Acai stem cells, this mist works wonders on your skin.

Our unique formula harnesses the rejuvenating properties of rose to deliver a revitalizing boost. Rose distillate hydrates and soothes, while peptides promote collagen production for a firmer, more youthful complexion. Pomegranate. Kakadu plum, Acai and Hibiscus extracts offer antioxidant protection, fighting against free radicals and environmental stressors. The addition of Rose & Acai stem cells helps to regenerate and renew your skin, leaving it looking radiant and refreshed.

This facial mist adds a burst of delightful freshness that will wake up your skin, tighten your pores, and fill your senses with the beautiful aromatic scent of pure rose. Carry it in your handbag and enjoy a spritz whenever you feel a little heated or overwhelmed; Refresh your hair or set your makeup to keep it in place all day (or night) long! In addition to its skin benefits, the Organic Rose Phyto3 Facial Mist can also be used to refresh and revitalize your hair.

How to Use

Our Organic Rose Phyto3 Facial Mist is designed for effortless and versatile application. Follow these simple steps to enjoy its refreshing benefits:

Shake well before use to ensure the ingredients are well-mixed.

Close your eyes and hold the mist approximately 6-8 inches away from your face.

Spritz the mist onto your face in a gentle, sweeping motion.

Allow the mist to naturally absorb into your skin or gently pat it in using your fingertips.

Use the mist whenever your skin needs a little pick-me-up. It can be applied both day and night, as desired.

For an extra cooling sensation, store the mist in the refrigerator before use.

Enjoy the rejuvenating and hydrating effects of the mist as it awakens your skin and leaves it feeling refreshed.

In addition to its skin benefits, the Organic Rose Phyto3 Facial Mist can also be used to refresh and revitalize your hair.

Make the Organic Rose Phyto3 Facial Mist a part of your daily skincare routine and experience the uplifting benefits it provides whenever your skin needs a revitalizing boost.

Benefits

-Refreshes and Revitalizes: Provides an instant burst of freshness, awakening and invigorating your skin. It helps to revive tired and dull-looking skin, leaving it revitalized and rejuvenated.

-Hydrates and Nourishes: Replenishes moisture and promotes a healthy, supple complexion. It nourishes the skin with essential nutrients, promoting overall skin health.

-Tightens Pores: The astringent properties of rose help to tighten and minimize the appearance of pores, giving your skin a smoother and more refined look.

-Antioxidant Protection: Our mist contains numerous antioxidants which help to neutralize free radicals, protecting the skin against environmental damage and premature aging. Excellent to use after sun exposure!

-Collagen Boost: The peptides in the mist stimulate collagen production, which helps to improve skin elasticity and firmness. It supports a more youthful complexion, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

-Regenerates and Renews: Promotes a healthier skin barrier and improves overall skin texture and tone.

-Delightful Aromatic Experience: a light rose/bergamot scent boosts relaxation and lifts your mood.

- Vegan

How to Use

Gently apply with a cotton pad or spray directly over your face with your eyes closed after cleansing. Benefits

-Prepares the Skin: preps the skin for better absorption of subsequent skincare products, such as serums, moisturizers, or treatments. It creates a clean canvas by removing any barriers that may hinder the penetration of active ingredients into the skin.

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Helps balance oil production, tightens pores and preps skin for proper absorption of products used afterwards (hint serum).
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Follow up your refreshing cleansing routine with this uplifting toner! This baby removes every last trace of make-up and grime from your face, neck, and body leaving you feeling clean and refreshed! Helps balance oil production, tightens pores and preps skin for proper absorption of products used afterwards (hint serum). Once you use this toner you’ll never be in a bad mood thanks to the wonderful scents of rose petals, pink grapefruit, and orange. It's the perfect scent combination of fresh and floral that you’re guaranteed to love time and time again. We promise you won’t stop smiling after using this product!

How to Use

Shake Well: Before using the toner, give the bottle a good shake to ensure that the ingredients are properly mixed.

-Soak a Cotton Ball: Take a cotton ball or pad and soak it with the toner. Make sure the cotton ball is saturated but not dripping.

-Upward Strokes: With gentle upward strokes, start wiping the soaked cotton ball across your face and neck. Begin from the center of your face and move outwards, covering your entire face and neck area. The upward motion helps lift the skin and promotes a more toned appearance.

-Follow with Serum and/or Face Cream: Once you have completed the toning process, allow the toner to absorb into the skin for a few moments. Then, follow up with your preferred serum and/ or face cream.

Benefits

-Restores pH Balance: helps restore the skin's natural pH balance, which can be disrupted by chemical laden cleansing products or environmental factors. Balanced pH levels promote healthier skin and can minimize issues like dryness, oiliness, and sensitivity.

-Deep Cleansing: acts as a second step in the cleansing process, effectively removing any remaining traces of dirt, oil, or makeup that may have been missed during cleansing. This helps prevent clogged pores and breakouts, leaving the skin clean and refreshed.

-Minimizes Pores: help s minimize the appearance of pores by tightening and refining them. It removes excess oil and impurities that can contribute to enlarged pores, resulting in a smoother and more refined complexion.

-Prepares the Skin: preps the skin for better absorption of subsequent skincare products, such as serums, moisturizers, or treatments. It creates a clean canvas by removing any barriers that may hinder the penetration of active ingredients into the skin.
