NAME: Power Repair Foaming Cleanser, 5oz Pump
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Our Power Repair Cleanser is formulated with all-natural and gentle ingredients that won't strip or dry your skin.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Why cleanse with chemically-laden cleansers when you can use an all-natural one that will actually provide results and lift your spirits while you lather up? Our Power Repair Cleanser is formulated with all-natural and gentle ingredients that won't strip or dry your skin. You’ll also enjoy some natural foaming action without the use of sulfates combined with a delightful citrus scent of orange and lemon. This scent is specifically designed to help boost your mood so that you can start your day in the best possible way!

How to Use

Apply a small amount to face and neck. Massage into skin using circular strokes. Rinse thoroughly with water. Follow up with a toner of choice.

Benefits

-Gentle Cleansing: The natural foaming cleanser effectively removes dirt, excess oil, and impurities from the skin without stripping it of its natural moisture. It provides a thorough yet gentle cleanse, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean.

-Balances Oil Production: The formula is designed to help balance the skin's oil production. It cleanses away excess oil without over-drying, making it suitable for all skin types, including oily and combination skin. Regular use can help regulate sebum production, reducing the occurrence of greasiness and breakouts.

-Non-Irritating and Soothing: Our natural cleanser is formulated with gentle, plant-derived ingredients that are less likely to cause irritation or allergic reactions. It contains soothing botanical extracts that help calm and comfort the skin, making it suitable for sensitive or reactive skin types.

-Deep Cleanses Pores: The foaming action of the cleanser helps to effectively cleanse the pores, removing impurities and preventing clogging. This can lead to a reduction in the appearance of blackheads, whiteheads, and breakouts, resulting in clearer and smoother skin.

-Refreshing and Invigorating: The foaming texture creates a luxurious and invigorating cleansing experience. It provides a refreshing sensation on the skin, awakening the senses and leaving you feeling revitalized.

Free from Harsh Chemicals: free from harsh chemicals, such as sulfates, parabens, and artificial fragrances. It is formulated with plant-based and skin-friendly ingredients, making it a safer and healthier choice for your skincare routine.

NAME: Power Repair Hyaluronic + C Serum, 1oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Power Repair Hyaluronic +C Serum is a multi-tasking serum that delivers long lasting hydration, boosts collagen production and protects skin from damage, while improving tone and texture.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our exceptional multi-tasking serum is designed to provide numerous benefits for your skin. Enriched with a potent 15% concentration of vitamin C ester, hyaluronic acid, and a collection of powerful antioxidants, it offers a comprehensive approach to skincare.

Vitamin C ester is a key ingredient in this serum, known for its brightening and antioxidant properties. With a 15% concentration, it helps even out skin tone, diminish the appearance of dark spots, and promote a more radiant complexion. Vitamin C ester also aids in collagen production, which can improve the skin's firmness and elasticity.

Hyaluronic acid is another important component, renowned for its moisturizing abilities. It acts as a humectant, attracting and retaining moisture in the skin, resulting in improved hydration and a plumper appearance. By maintaining optimal hydration levels, hyaluronic acid helps to support a healthy skin barrier.

The collection of potent antioxidants in our serum works together to protect your skin from the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental stressors. Free radicals are unstable molecules that can contribute to premature aging and skin damage. Antioxidants help neutralize these free radicals, reducing their harmful impact and promoting a healthier complexion.

How to Use

Start with a clean face: Wash your face with a gentle cleanser and pat it dry. Ensure that your skin is free from dirt, oil, and makeup residue.

Dispense a dime-sized amount onto your fingertips or the palm of your hand. A dime-sized amount is generally sufficient to cover your face and neck.

Apply to face and neck: Gently massage the serum onto your face and neck using upward motions. Start from the center of your face and work your way outward. Be sure to cover the entire surface area, including your forehead, cheeks, nose, chin, and neck.

Allow it to absorb: Give the serum a few moments to fully absorb into your skin. You may notice a slight tingling sensation, which is normal and temporary.

Follow up with moisturizer: After the serum has absorbed, you can apply your facial oil and/or face cream. This step helps lock in the moisture and provides additional hydration to your skin.

Morning and night application: For optimal results, it is recommended to use the serum both in the morning and at night. This helps maintain a consistent supply of vitamin C to your skin throughout the day.

Sunscreen application: During the daytime, it's crucial to follow up with a broad-spectrum sunscreen with an SPF of 30 or higher.

Benefits

Deep Hydration: Hyaluronic acid is a powerful humectant that can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water, making it highly effective in hydrating the skin. When combined with vitamin C, it enhances the moisturizing properties, leaving your skin deeply hydrated and plump.

Skin Firming and Tightening: The combination of hyaluronic acid and vitamin C stimulates collagen production, which helps improve skin elasticity and firmness. Regular use of the serum can contribute to a more youthful and toned appearance, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Brightens and Evens Skin Tone: Vitamin C is renowned for its brightening properties. When paired with hyaluronic acid, it helps fade dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone. The serum promotes a more radiant complexion, giving your skin a healthy and vibrant glow.

Antioxidant Protection: Vitamin C + E, Ferulic Acid and Alpha Lipoic are potent antioxidants that help neutralize free radicals, which are harmful molecules that can damage the skin and accelerate the aging process. By protecting against oxidative stress, the serum aids in maintaining the overall health and vitality of your skin.

Enhances Skin's Natural Barrier: Hyaluronic acid and vitamin C both support the skin's natural barrier function. They help strengthen the protective layer of the skin, preventing moisture loss and shielding it from environmental aggressors such as pollution and UV radiation.

Suitable for All Skin Types: The hyaluronic acid and vitamin C serum is suitable for all skin types, including dry, oily, combination, and sensitive skin. Its lightweight and non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, providing nourishment without clogging pores or causing irritation.

Promotes a Youthful Appearance: Regular use of the serum can help promote a more youthful appearance by improving skin texture, reducing the signs of aging, and enhancing overall skin health. It can be a valuable addition to your skincare routine in maintaining a radiant and revitalized complexion.

NAME: Power Repair Skin Therapy Oil
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: An exceptional skincare elixir that combines the potency of powerful botanical oils and antioxidants to rejuvenate and nourish your skin.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our Power Repair Facial Oil—an exceptional skincare elixir that combines the potency of powerful botanical oils and antioxidants to rejuvenate and nourish your skin. This luxurious facial oil is formulated to address multiple skin concerns and provide transformative results. 

How to Use

Shake well before use. Pump 1 to 2 drops of oil into palm and apply to face & neck. Use morning and night. *Store in a cool and dry place after opening*

Benefits

-Deep Nourishment and Hydration: Our facial oil is infused with a blend of nutrient-rich botanical oils that deeply penetrate the skin, delivering essential vitamins, minerals, and fatty acids. It provides intense hydration, replenishing the skin's moisture barrier and leaving it soft, supple, and radiant.

-Antioxidant Protection: Packed with potent antioxidants, our facial oil helps to neutralize free radicals and protect the skin from environmental damage. This shields the skin from premature aging, boosts collagen production, and promotes a more youthful appearance.

-Smooths Fine Lines and Wrinkles: The power of botanical oils in our formula helps to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It supports skin elasticity, improves skin tone, and promotes a smoother, more refined complexion.

-Improves Skin Texture and Tone: With regular use, our facial oil helps to improve overall skin texture and tone. It can reduce the appearance of scars, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone, revealing a more even and luminous complexion.

-Soothing and Calming: Our carefully selected blend of botanical oils includes ingredients known for their soothing and calming properties. It can help alleviate redness, irritation, and inflammation, making it suitable for sensitive skin.

-Versatile Application: The lightweight texture of our facial oil allows for easy absorption and can be used alone or in combination with other skincare products. It can be applied in the morning or evening, providing a nourishing boost to your skincare routine.

NAME: Power Repair Vitamin C Solution, 1oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Experience the transformative power of our Vitamin C Solution, an advanced oil-free treatment that combines a super blend of antioxidants with a potent 15% concentration of Vitamin C.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Experience the transformative power of our Vitamin C Solution, an advanced oil-free treatment that combines a super blend of antioxidants with a potent 15% concentration of Vitamin C. This unique formulation tightens, lifts, and revitalizes your skin, while effectively boosting collagen production and enhancing firmness. By harnessing the synergistic effects of powerful antioxidants and Vitamin C, our solution promotes a more vibrant complexion, leaving your skin visibly rejuvenated and radiant. Follow with our Power Repair Serum or Face Cream for best results.

How to Use

On a clean face, massage 5-10 drops over face and neck until fully absorbed. Apply morning and night. Follow with our Power Repair Skin Serum or Face Cream.
Always shake bottle first
*Store in a cool place after opening*

Benefits

-Antioxidant Protection: neutralizes free radicals, which are unstable molecules that can damage the skin cells. By reducing oxidative stress, our Vitamin C Solution protects the skin from environmental pollutants, UV radiation, and other sources of oxidative damage.

-Collagen Production: Vitamin C plays a crucial role in collagen synthesis, a protein that provides structural support to the skin. By promoting collagen production, vitamin C helps improve skin elasticity, firmness, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

-Brightening and Even Skin Tone: Vitamin C has skin brightening properties. It inhibits the production of melanin, the pigment responsible for dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Regular use of our Vitamin C Solution can help fade dark spots, even out skin tone, and promote a more radiant complexion.

-Sun Damage Repair: repairs damage caused by sun exposure. It can reduce the appearance of sunspots, minimize redness and inflammation, and promote the healing of sunburns.

-Protection Against UV Damage: Although vitamin C cannot replace sunscreen, it can provide some additional protection against the harmful effects of UV radiation. It helps neutralize free radicals generated by UV exposure and minimizes the potential damage caused by UV rays.

-Anti-Inflammatory Properties: making it beneficial for individuals with inflammatory skin conditions like acne, rosacea, or eczema. It can help reduce redness, calm the skin, and alleviate inflammation

NAME: Renewal Peel 5oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Renewal Peel Exfoliating Mask is a gentle, non-abrasive mask that helps stimulate and exfoliate the skin's surface.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Looking for a way to reveal fresh, glowing skin? Renewal Peel Exfoliating Mask is a gentle, non-abrasive mask that helps stimulate and exfoliate the skin's surface. Enriched with fruit and beta-enzymes, this new improved formula lifts dead skin cells to uncover a healthy looking complexion. Moisturizing and exfoliating in one easy step, Renewal Peel is your go-to for radiant skin.

How to Use

Apply lightly to face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Leave applied for 5-20 minutes, depending your comfortability and desired results (the tingling feeling means it's working its magic!) Use a warm damp washcloth to remove the mask and rinse face thoroughly. Proceed with your desired facial cleanser and regular skincare routine. For best results, consistency is key, use this mask once a week, and remember to apply your SPF!

Benefits

Gentle Exfoliation: Fruit enzymes, such as apple and pineapple offer natural exfoliating properties. They gently dissolve dead skin cells on the surface of the skin, helping to reveal a smoother, brighter complexion without the need for harsh physical exfoliants.

-Deep Cleansing: penetrates the pores and breaks down impurities, excess oil, and buildup, providing a deep cleansing effect. This helps to unclog pores, reduce the occurrence of blackheads and whiteheads, and promote clearer skin.

-Brightens and Evens Skin Tone: helps to fade dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone over time. Regular use of our fruit enzyme mask can promote a more radiant and even complexion, enhancing your natural glow.

-Enhances Skin Renewal: Fruit enzymes stimulate cell turnover and promote the regeneration of new, healthy skin cells. This can improve the overall texture and smoothness of the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and roughness.

-Nourishing and Hydrating: rich in vitamins, antioxidants, and hydrating properties resulting in a plump, supple, and moisturized complexion.

-Natural and Plant-Based: formulated with natural and plant-based ingredients, a safer and healthier option for your skincare routine. Free from harsh chemicals and synthetic fragrances, minimizing the risk of irritation or adverse reactions.

ROSE - An aroma that harmoniously blends sweet, woody, fruity, and floral notes. Renowned for its high vibrational frequency, this exquisite flower uplifts spirits, instills joy, and promotes inner strength.

- For best results, use daily as part of your skincare routine to maintain soft and healthy-looking skin.
- Embrace your luxurious ritual and enjoy the nourishing benefits of prioritizing selfcare with our body oils.
 
Benefits
 
- Rapid absorption for instant nourishment
- Feather-light formula for effortless application
- Deep hydration for luxuriously soft skin
- Unveils a supple and radiant complexion
- Smooths dryness and rough patches

NAME: Rose Phyto Pomegranate Hand & Body Cream - 4 oz.
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This hand and body lotion is all you need to infuse your skin with the type of luxurious, rich moisture that it dreams of.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
If your skin is parched, no regular old moisturizer will do, and if you can’t find “the one”, the search is over! This hand and body lotion is all you need to infuse your skin with the type of luxurious, rich moisture that it dreams of. This cream will envelop your skin in luscious hydration thanks to our signature blend of butters, botanical oils, Vitamins C and E. 

How to Use

Apply all over body after a shower or bath to comfort and nourish dry or irritated skin.

Benefits

Deep Moisturization: The hand and body cream is rich in moisturizing ingredients such as pomegranate butter, cocoa butter, shea butter, and raspberry butter. These ingredients deeply hydrate the skin, providing intense moisturization and leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and nourished.

Skin Nourishment: This cream nourishes the skin, delivering a range of beneficial compounds that support its health and vitality.

Improved Skin Elasticity: The combination of these buttery ingredients helps improve the skin's elasticity and firmness. Regular use of the cream can contribute to a more toned and youthful appearance, reducing the visibility of fine lines and wrinkles.

Protection against Dryness: The rich and emollient texture of the hand and body cream creates a protective barrier on the skin, preventing moisture loss and shielding it from harsh environmental factors. It helps combat dryness, especially in areas prone to dryness like hands, elbows, and knees.
Soothes and Calms Irritation: Shea butter and cocoa butter are known for their soothing and calming properties. They can help alleviate dry, itchy, or irritated skin, providing relief and comfort.

Antioxidant Protection: Pomegranate butter and raspberry butter are rich in antioxidants, which help protect the skin against oxidative stress and free radicals. This helps prevent premature aging and maintains the overall health and youthfulness of the skin.

Suitable for All Skin Types: The cream is suitable for all skin types, including dry, normal, combination, and sensitive skin. Its nourishing and gentle formula makes it a versatile option for anyone seeking deep hydration and skin nourishment.

Versatile Application: The cream can be used on both the hands and body, providing a multi-purpose solution for overall skin care. It can be applied to dry patches, rough areas, or any areas in need of intensive hydration and nourishment.

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body systems.

food-grade preservatives only

DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Skin Therapy

Ozonated Olive Oil for Any Skin-Related Need*

O2-Zap has been reformulated into our NEW Skin Therapy. Skin Therapy smoothes and deeply moisturizes the skin with organic ozonated olive — making it perfect for all skin types. What Is Skin Therapy?

Skin Therapy is an antioxidant-rich balm crafted with organic ozonated olive oil. Made by bubbling ozone through organic olive oil to saturate it with oxygen, Skin Therapy moisturizes in a way that nothing else can. From nourishing dry, cracked skin to soothing itches and scratches, Skin Therapy can be used for just about any skin-related need. Our rich balm is unscented and perfect for all skin types! Use morning or night as part of your skincare routine or for any cut, scrape, bug bite, or scratch. Keep refrigerated to preserve the natural ingredients.*

Preserving this luxe, plant-based formula is important to us, which is why Skin Therapy is packaged in MIRON Violetglass jars. The unique properties of this glass protect Skin Therapy's ingredients from the harmful effects of light, increase shelf life, and revitalize their potency.*

Why Your Skin Will Love Skin Therapy

Crafted with ozonated olive oil to deeply nourish and enhance healthy-looking skin.*

Ultra Moisturizing*

Dry skin, chapped lips, or a flaky scalp? Wherever your dry skin and whatever the cause, Skin Therapy delivers moisturizing oxygen that hydrates and makes your skin look great.*

Heals the Skin*

Don’t let cuts, scrapes, and scratches linger or leave a mark. Apply a little Skin Therapy or use it with your bandage to stimulate quick, healthy healing.*

Clears Complexion*

Dealing with acne or acne scars? Is your complexion not as even as you want? Olive oil provides the nutrients and antioxidants that nourish your skin down deep.*

Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.

NAME: Super-Dry Soother
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: The name says it all - click name to read more!
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
How Our SUPER-DRY Soother Differs from our Baby and Adult Skin Soother.

Quite simply, it is a different formula with a slightly different focus. Both products were created to soothe dry skin conditions. The SUPER-DRY Soother is meant to be a stronger formula for more severe dryness. We’ve combined different herbs, used organic sunflower oil and the scents of bergamot and lavender to make a lovely smelling and smooth feeling product that anyone can use. We hope you’ll share it with the people you love for things as simple as general moisturizing and as troubling as severe winter dryness on the hands or feet–and everything in between.

Sunflower Oil has been shown in research to create a protective barrier for damaged or vulnerable skin. Here is a link to an article on that research: Sunflower Oil Research Article. The herbs in this formula are herbs traditionally used to promote circulation and accelerate healing. Altogether, our Super-Dry Soother is meant to soothe and beautify any type of dry skin, even when it is Super-Dry.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Holiday Gift Ideas >>> Winter Moisturizers || Beauty, Hair & Skin Care

Every day we take into our systems a wide variety of toxins and chemical from our lifestyles, including stress, habits, the foods we eat, and even the air we breathe.  it is of utmost importance to increase the chi (life force energy) within in order to strengthen the function of our organ systems and purify our minds and spirits so that the natural detoxification process of our bodies works at its optimal level.

This revolutionary soak is a combination of modern science and ancient herbal wisdom. This 20-minute treatment consists of powerful East Asian herbs, including Burdock Root, Ledebouriella and Moutan.  These herbs have been known throughout the centuries to detoxify and relax muscles enabling the proper flow of chi (energy) throughout the body.  Feel the difference for yourself!

  • Burdock Root is known to: Moisten the intestines and promotes bowel movements, Resolve toxicity, Have an antibiotic effect
  • Ledebouriella (Saposhnikoviae Root) is known to: Harmonize the intestines, Reduce tenesmus and alleviate spasms, Alleviate gas and bloating
  • Cortex Moutan is known to: Increase circulation, Have an anti-microbial effect, Clear the liver, Reduce swelling
  • Mulberry is known to: Have a detoxifying effect, Reduce edema, Have an effect on harmonizing blood pressure

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.

NAME: Vitanutrient Face Cream
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This moisturizer combines nutrient-rich oils, butters, antioxidants, and essential oils to deliver hydration, combat dryness, and protect the skin against environmental stressors.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This moisturizer combines nutrient-rich oils, butters, antioxidants, and essential oils to deliver hydration, combat dryness, and protect the skin against environmental stressors. It also has soothing and anti-aging properties, contributing to a healthier and more radiant

How to Use

For best results, use twice daily, morning & night. Massage a small amount to face & neck.

Benefits

- Protects the skin from oxidative stress
- Improves firmness and elasticity
- Plumps fine lines and wrinkles
- Decreases dry skin and rough patches
- Provides a youthful glow
- BEEGAN

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

  • food-grade preservatives only:  We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.
  • High Quality Ingredients:  We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.
  • Organic or Wildcrafted Herbs:  We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Holiday Gift Ideas || Topical Formulations >>> Facial Care

Water (purified), grape seed oil; jojoba oil; jasmine flower wax; virgin coconut oil; rose hip seed oil; shea butter; cocoa butter; beeswax; rose water; orange blossom water; aloe vera gel; Vitamin C ester; Vitamin E; alpha lipoic acid; CoEnzyme Q10; DMAE; pure essential oils of neroli, yuzuzu, sweet orange, lemon, bergamot and geranium; lecithin; glucose oxidase; and enzyme lactoperoxidase.
